105.title: Eclipse Comics--Archives
notes:
The Michigan State
        University Libraries are the depository for what are called the
        "Eclipse Deadfiles," several dozen boxes of production
        materials of which some have been listed below. The Library
        does not own original art, film, or reproduction rights for any
        Eclipse publications.
